text.section:
The powers and duties of each Program are vested in and exercised by:
in Montgomery County, the county planning board in consultation with the Montgomery County Historic Preservation Commission; and
subject to subsection (b) of this section, in Prince George's County, the county planning board.

section.section: In Prince George's County, the county, by local law, may provide for the historic preservation, outreach and marketing, and maintenance of historic properties activities of the Commission.
A local law enacted under paragraph (1) of this subsection shall be consistent with the provisions of this division.
